sections.title: What is BBVA and how does the bonus work
content: BBVA is a Spanish bank that launched in Italy with a free online account featuring an Italian IBAN and virtual/physical card.
Open an account and make any purchase with the card to receive a ‚Ç¨10 bonus directly in your account.
You can invite up to 10 friends to earn ‚Ç¨20 for each one who registers and meets the conditions.
The account also offers 4% cashback on monthly purchases and 4% interest on non-locked deposits.

sections.title: Requirements to get the bonus
content: Make at least one purchase of any amount within 90 days of opening the account using the BBVA card (virtual or physical).
You can deposit via free bank transfer or debit/credit card (instant transfer recommended).
Set up a direct debit of any amount within 90 days to earn an extra ‚Ç¨20 bonus.
The bonus is credited within a few days of the purchase
Document verification is required with a valid ID and selfie.
The account opens in about 10-15 minutes.
Only adults (18+) can participate.

sections.title: Step-by-step guide to activate the account and unlock the bonus
content: 1. Download the BBVA app for Android or iOS.
2. Start registration and enter all required data. Remember to enter the promo code at the indicated step.
3. Scan your ID (front/back) and take a selfie for verification.
4. Wait for verification (usually a few minutes).
5. Choose whether to use the virtual card immediately or also order the free physical card.
6. Top up the account via transfer (recommended: a ‚Ç¨2 transfer from apps like Revolut) or card.
7. Make a purchase with the BBVA card to activate the bonus (e.g., Amazon or phone recharge, online or in-store purchases).
